text: @jeffsessions @realDonaldTrump @JoeBiden Do you mean the part about slowing down Covid-19 testing or when he drank a glass of water or when he told the totally untrue story about the ramp walk or the one where he called a Boeing exec a dumb son of a bitch or...? What exactly did you hear that was inspiring?
